The claim was posted on Facebook on Janu: 2021, with a screenshot of a post stating that "LA suspends cremation of Covid-19 bodies due to Air Pollution! Instead increase the number of burials."
The Sinhala: language caption of the post translates to English as "USA city suspends Covid-19 Cremation."
Professor Meththika Vithanage: a Sri Lankan academic, has expressed support for the Sri Lankan government's policy on mandatory cremations of Covid-19 fatalities due to concerns about pollution from cemeteries.
The CNN article published on January 18: 2021, states that the South Coast Air Quality Management District temporarily suspended limits on cremations in Los Angeles County due to a "backlog" of bodies caused by the pandemic.
